text: Ottawan is a French pop music duo, who had the hit singles "D.I.S.C.O." and "Hands Up (Give Me Your Heart)" in the early 1980s. Fronted by Patrick Jean- Baptiste and formerly Annette Eltice, the band were masterminded through a cooperation between French producer Daniel Vangarde and Belgian producer Jean Kluger. ==See also== *Santa Esmeralda *Arabesque *Cerrone *Baccara *Dschinghis Khan *Gibson Brothers *Patrick Hernandez *Alison Limerick *Alison Goldfrapp *Tavares Category:French musical groups
title: Ottawan
